# NIDLTDOACoordinatesType.relative

**Case**

A coordinate type that specifies a 3D Cartesian triplet.

## Declaration

```swift
case relative
```

## Discussion

When the coordinate type ([doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement/coordinatesType]) for a given measurement ([doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement]) is this option, the value of the measurement’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement/coordinates] is a triplet of the format (x, y, z).

## Identifying a coordinate type

- **NIDLTDOACoordinatesType.geodetic**: A coordinate type that specifies a latitude, longitude, and altitude triplet.
